info.description: This is the backend API for the Hazel project management application.
info.title: Hazel Project Management API

post.description: Get a new access token using a refresh token
Authenticate user and return session tokens
Verify a user's email with a code
Request a new verification code for a user
Create a new project in a workspace

get.description: Get all tasks for a project

post.description: Create a new task in a project

get.description: Get all users assigned to a task

post.description: Assign a task to a user

delete.description: Remove a user's assignment from a task

get.description: Get user details by user ID
Get all workspaces where the authenticated user has membership
Get all members of a workspace

post.description: Add a member to a workspace

delete.description: Remove a member from a workspace

get.description: Get all projects for a workspace
